titleStmt.title: The several declarations, together with the several depositions made in Council on Monday, the 22d of October, 1688. Concerning the birth of the Prince of Wales. N.B. Those mark'd with this mark, * were Roman Catholicks.
Miscellaneous Documents. 1688
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: First published in 1688 as 'At the Council-chamber in Whitehall, Monday the 22d of October, 1688'.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
